00028 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00029 {
00030   createinfo(argc, argv);
00031 
00032   /* enough arguments ? */
00033 
00034   if (argc < 4) {
00035     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s PROJPARA MBSTATE MBSTATE\n",
00036             argv[0]);
00037     exit(-1);
00038   }
00039 
00040   int odd;
00041 
00042   char* projpar = argv[optind];
00043   char** mbfile = &argv[optind+1];
00044 
00045   MultiSlaterDet Q[2];
00046   Indices In[2];
00047 
00048   int i;
00049   for (i=0; i<2; i++) {
00050     extractIndicesfromString(&mbfile, &In[i]);
00051     if (readMultiSlaterDetfromFile(&Q[i], &In[i], mbfile[i]))
00052       exit(-1);
00053   }
00054 
00055   // odd numer of nucleons ?
00056   odd = Q[0].A % 2;
00057 
00058   // Projection parameters
00059   Projection P;
00060   initProjection(&P, odd, projpar);
00061 
00062   void* emome   = initprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEMonopole, &Q[0], &Q[1]); 
00063   void* edipme  = initprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEDipole, &Q[0], &Q[1]); 
00064   void* mdipme  = initprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpMDipole, &Q[0], &Q[1]);
00065   void* equadme = initprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEQuadrupole, &Q[0], &Q[1]);
00066 
00067   // read or calculate matrix elements
00068 
00069   if (readprojectedMultiMBMEfromFile(mbfile[0], mbfile[1], &Q[0], &Q[1],
00070                                      &P, &OpEMonopole, emome)) {
00071     calcprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEMonopole, &Q[0], &Q[1], emome);
00072     writeprojectedMultiMBMEtoFile(mbfile[0], mbfile[1], &Q[0], &Q[1], 
00073                                   &P, &OpEMonopole, emome);
00074   }
00075   if (readprojectedMultiMBMEfromFile(mbfile[0], mbfile[1], &Q[0], &Q[1],
00076                                      &P, &OpEDipole, edipme)) {
00077     calcprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEDipole, &Q[0], &Q[1], edipme);
00078     writeprojectedMultiMBMEtoFile(mbfile[0], mbfile[1], &Q[0], &Q[1], 
00079                                   &P, &OpEDipole, edipme);
00080   }

00082                                      &P, &OpMDipole, mdipme)) {
